alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Laurens; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 9:04PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Wilkinson, southeastern Twiggs and northeastern Bleckley Counties through 930 PM EST... At 903 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Cary, or 10 miles north of Cochran, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Cochran, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Dudley, Toomsboro, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Tarversville, Nicklesville, Royal, District Path, Harlow, Goldsboro, Chappells Mill, Rebie and Cary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
